string-array.name: countries
string-array.item: South Georgia and the South Sandwich Islands

string-array.name: tables
string-array.item: CREATE TABLE IF NOT EXISTS identifiers ( id INT NOT NULL UNIQUE COLLATE NOCASE, type TEXT NOT NULL COLLATE NOCASE, name TEXT NOT NULL COLLATE NOCASE, PRIMARY KEY (id, type))
CREATE TABLE IF NOT EXISTS forms ( form_date DATETIME, timestamp DATETIME NOT NULL, form TEXT NOT NULL COLLATE NOCASE, content TEXT NOT NULL COLLATE NOCASE, obs TEXT NOT NULL COLLATE NOCASE)

CREATE TABLE IF NOT EXISTS offline_forms ( timestamp DATETIME NOT NULL, username TEXT NOT NULL COLLATE NOCASE, form TEXT NOT NULL COLLATE NOCASE, json TEXT NOT NULL COLLATE NOCASE, PRIMARY KEY (timestamp))

CREATE TABLE IF NOT EXISTS percentile_measurement( gender TEXT NOT NULL COLLATE NOCASE, age TEXT NOT NULL COLLATE NOCASE, P3 TEXT NOT NULL COLLATE NOCASE, P5 TEXT NOT NULL COLLATE NOCASE, P10 TEXT NOT NULL COLLATE NOCASE, P25 TEXT NOT NULL COLLATE NOCASE, P50 TEXT NOT NULL COLLATE NOCASE, P75 TEXT NOT NULL COLLATE NOCASE, P90 TEXT NOT NULL COLLATE NOCASE, P95 TEXT NOT NULL COLLATE NOCASE, P97 TEXT NOT NULL COLLATE NOCASE)

string-array.name: unable_to_bring_family_options
string-array.item: My Family is Well and Asymptomtic
